title: Elegant frame design
subtitle: Delights the legs, pleases the eye.
content:
Elegant frame design

Delights the legs, pleases the eye.

The shape of the frame is reminiscent of a traditional roadster. And you’re guaranteed to reach your destination in comfort, thanks to its suspension fork and suspension seatpost. It powerfully assists you with a 500 Wh carrier battery in conjunction with the seamlessly integrated Bosch Performance Line motor. The low step-through ensures comfortable handling in urban traffic, while the integrated cabling accentuates its elegant appearance.
